citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1045am on
08-Aug-19.
Inspector contacted the licensee and the licensee stated that he was out of town helping family members.

narrative:
